text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.B.DE153Assessment and provision of vaccinationsOffer other clinical services - Assessment and provision of vaccinations
    HIV.B.DE154Hepatitis B (HBV) and hepatitis C virus (HCV) testing and treatmentOffer other clinical services - Hepatitis B (HBV) and hepatitis C virus (HCV) testing and treatment
    HIV.B.DE155Co-trimoxazole chemoprophylaxis to prevent pneumocystis carinii pneumoniaOffer other clinical services - Co-trimoxazole chemoprophylaxis to prevent pneumocystis carinii pneumonia
    HIV.B.DE156Intensified TB case finding and linkage to TB treatmentOffer other clinical services - Intensified TB case finding and linkage to TB treatment
    HIV.B.DE157Provision of isoniazid preventive therapy if person does not have TBOffer other clinical services - Provision of isoniazid preventive therapy if person does not have TB
    HIV.B.DE158Malaria prevention (such as bed nets and prophylaxis), depending on epidemiologyOffer other clinical services - Malaria prevention (such as bed nets and prophylaxis), depending on epidemiology
    HIV.C.DE140Assessment and provision of vaccinationsOffer other clinical services - Assessment and provision of vaccinations
    HIV.C.DE141Hepatitis B virus (HBV) and hepatitis C virus (HCV) testing and treatmentOffer other clinical services - Hepatitis B virus (HBV) and hepatitis C virus (HCV) testing and treatment
    HIV.C.DE142Co-trimoxazole chemoprophylaxis to prevent pneumocystis carinii pneumoniaOffer other clinical services - Co-trimoxazole chemoprophylaxis to prevent pneumocystis carinii pneumonia
    HIV.C.DE143Intensified TB case finding and linkage to TB treatmentOffer other clinical services - Intensified TB case finding and linkage to TB treatment
    HIV.C.DE144Provision of isoniazid preventive therapy if person does not have TBOffer other clinical services - Provision of isoniazid preventive therapy if person does not have TB
    HIV.C.DE145Malaria prevention (such as bed nets and prophylaxis), depending on epidemiologyOffer other clinical services - Malaria prevention (such as bed nets and prophylaxis), depending on epidemiology

title: Offer other clinical services Codes
description: Codes representing possible values for the Offer other clinical services element
